chara.textHome: Yes! This flower is called a hyacinth!

Lots of people grow them
in elementary school...
Maybe you did too?

They come in red, pink, yellow, purple...
all kinds of colors!
Hm? Oh, my name?

I thought you were asking
the flower's name...
I'm Konomi Haruna.

It feels great to be recognized
for all my hard work!

If I were to express my feelings
through a bouquet, I'm sure
it would be a fantastic one!

There's still plenty of beautiful flowers
that haven't blossomed yet!

Nothing's going to beat me!
Not the wind, nor the rain!
The flower in my heart is really resilient, see?
When do you think I got so powerful?

Back when I started I was a real crybaby,
too...

I guess I owe this growth
to all the kind people in my life!

Sometimes life throws hard things at you...
but sitting and crying won't make it stop.

I can use my hard work and ideas
to make a change.

And even if I slip up, someone
will be there to help me.
Welcome. This one isn't for sale...

It's actually a flower I had at home.
It bloomed so beautifully,
I just wanted to show it to you.
You have to water flowers in the morning!
Especially when it's hot...

If you water them during the day
when the temperature is high,
your flowers will overheat.

I'm thinking of having a cup of
chamomile tea after lunch...

Would you like one too?
It'll help you relax.
Welcome!

Um, we just had some new 
flowers delivered this morning.
Would you like to see them?

This flower blooms at night. 
That's why they call it the
"Queen of the Night"...
It's a wonderful name...

The person who gave it that name
must be wonderful too.

I think flowers are...something that you
send to people who are special to you.

That's why I want to study more
about them... So that I'll be able
to make lovely bouquets.

J-just a moment, okay?
I have to take care of something.
Let's go somewhere after I'm done.

You know, I have so much more I want to do
with the flower shop and flower arranging.

That's what keeps me going.
I feel like I can take on just about
any enemy thanks to those feelings.

It's often said that flowers have
short life spans,

but there are lots of ways you can
enjoy them for a looong time.

You could dry flowers to
preserve them, for example.

For the first time in quite a while 
I got some flowers as a gift.

It reminded me how lovely it is
to get flowers as a present.

I became a Magical Girl because I wanted 
to save the shop for Auntie and the others.
I'm so happy that I get to work with them.

Ack! Oh, I was just thinking
about the new fertilizer, and...
You made me jump!

Kaede and Kako will be
arriving at the shop soon.
Have you ever talked to them?
They're both so kind and sweet.
Kaede knows a lot about plants.
Especially vegetables, I think?

Hmm, I wonder if a bouquet of
vegetable flowers would work.
You could eat the vegetables, too...

Today I'm reading this book Kako
recommended to me.

I like reading in the bath, relaxing
as I soak in the hot water.
Hey...
Do you know the Ghost Flower Girl?
Hehe...hahaha! Oh... It's nothing!

Kako and Kaede might know
something about it, though.

I hope that one day someone special 
gives me a big bouquet of flowers...
*Giggle*
That's a secret, okay?

Will I be able to make a flower bloom
from this?

Because of you,
I'm able to work with a big smile!
How about a...celebration bouquet?
Everyone's smile is in full bloom!
I want to give everyone a bouquet...!
I'm Konomi Haruna!

Why don't you try giving some flowers
to someone precious in your life?
You could give them a nice bouquet of tulips!
Wait...are you not interested in flowers?

Just like a sunflower turning to the sun...
I've got to grow, too!
So my own flower is at full bloom now too...
I wonder what color it is?

The sight of all those blooming flowers
makes me think I can do anything, too!

No matter what, once you start something
you have to keep putting in the effort
to finish it!
That's true for florists AND Magical Girls!
No cutting corners!

The flowers that survive harsh winters
have the prettiest blossoms.

If I'd given up before I got here,
I'd never have known how good it felt!
